name: Artifarm
description:
Artifarm is a colony simulator about building your own town on Mars.

Key Features:

  • Randomly generated worlds!
  • Day/Night system!
  • Research Tree!
  • Mange bots' permissions to make everything work automatically!
  • Farming, Mining, Building and more!

A Little Roadmap:

  • More plants
  • More researches
  • More buildings
  • Deeper mechanics
  • More sound effects
  • Soundtrack
